description: HMXZ projects are used for creating various kinds of help documentation and technical manuals. They can be exported to several different help formats, including Winhelp ( .HLP ), HTML Help ( .CHM ), and the .EPUB eBook format.
The other Help & Manual project format ( .HMXP files) also uses XML formatting for the project file, but it does not save all the files in the same Zip archive.
NOTE: HMXZ and HMXP files were introduced with Help & Manual version 5.
